data: Looking backward, Hodder perceived that he had really come to the momentous decision of remaining at St. John’s in the twilight of an evening when, on returning home from seeing Kate Marcy at Mr. Bentley’s he had entered the darkening church.
The Inside of the Cup — Volume 06
